text:
November 9* 1959
Mr* Raymond I). Hurlbert
General Manager
Alabama Educational Television Commission
807 Protective Life Building
Birmingham 3, Alabama
Dear Ray:
Thanks so much for the nice note;
comments such as yours make all the effort
seem well worthwhile*
I feel its been a good year for NArv8,
but it* s largely due to the hard work of people
such as yourself.
Cordially,
William G. Harley
WGH: cp
